summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank detailing account activity for a business account over the period from October 1, 2017, to October 31, 2017. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and the ending balance, highlighting significant transactions including large wire transfers and incoming funds.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the relationship manager for the business account in question.

events.title: Incoming Wire Transfer
events.description: An incoming wire transfer of $275,000.00 was recorded.

events.title: Multiple Transactions
events.description: Multiple transactions including a wire transfer and distributions from Midway Investors were recorded.

events.title: Funds Transfer
events.description: A funds transfer of $45,000.00 was made.

events.title: Outgoing Wire Transfer
events.description: An outgoing wire transfer of $25,000.00 was executed.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $5,301.50 and an ending balance of $161,705.38.
There were five withdrawals totaling $150,030.00 during the statement period.
The document indicates a significant incoming wire transfer of $275,000.00 on October 11, 2017.
Service charges were applied, including a $30.00 charge on October 12, 2017.
The account maintained a total combined monthly average balance of $534,307.49.
